::: {#first-section}
Oliver Saal is a sociologist of education, minorities, and security
research. My academic interests include quantitative analysis,
especially network and latent factor models, Higher Education studies,
and the sociology of risk perception. My free time is spent watching
RuPaul's Drag Race, producing documentary films, and hobby programming.

## Education

[**Åbo Akademi University**](https://abo.fi/en/) \| Turku, Finland <br/>
D.Soc.Sc. in Sociology \| 2020 - current <br/> M.Soc.Sc. in Sociology \|
2018 - 2020 <br/> B.Soc.Sc. in Sociology \| 2015 - 2018
